Exotic and sophisticated. Bundle includes 5 items at a savings of over 30%!

• Raiment of the Seven Winds Top (Female) – Azure
• Jewels of the Seven Winds (Female) – Azure
• Raiment of the Seven Winds Pants (Female) – Azure
• Slippers of the Seven Winds (Female) – Azure
• Crown of the Seven Winds (Female) – Azure [#Legal]

• Joyaux des sept vents (femme) – azuré
• Tenue des sept vents, pantalon (femme) – azuré
• Babouches des sept vents (femme) – azuré
• Couronne des sept vents (femme) – azuré [#Legal]
